consumer_complaint_narrative: I 'm a XXXX who performed work as per agreed contract proposal, however the property was foreclosed, and sold in the middle of construction, the insurance company paid the mortgage company in full for the Accident Repair work to be performed, the mortgage company sent a " Conditional Waiver and Release of Lien '' for me to sign and send back. I was also instructed to await the agreed final payment and to cease all work, I did as directed. I sent it back XXXX XXXX, 2015 ; however I still have not been paid as promised ( stated on conditional lien release )
